books.author: by Kim and Krickitt Carpenter with Dana Wilkerson
books.description: After a horrific car crash, a couple embark on a journey to fall in love all over again. The true events that inspired the movie.
books.name: THE VOW

books.author: by Charles Duhigg
books.description: A Times reporter’s account of the science behind how we form, and break, habits.
books.name: THE POWER OF HABIT

books.author: by Todd Burpo with Lynn Vincent
books.description: A father recounts his 3-year-old son’s encounter with Jesus and the angels during an appendectomy.
books.name: HEAVEN IS FOR REAL

books.author: by Chris Kyle with Scott McEwen and Jim DeFelice
books.description: A member of the Navy SEALs discusses his childhood, his marriage and his battlefield experiences.
books.name: AMERICAN SNIPER

books.author: by Walter Isaacson
books.description: A biography of the recently deceased entrepreneur, based on 40 interviews with Jobs conducted over two years.
books.name: STEVE JOBS

books.author: by Bill O'Reilly and Martin Dugard
books.description: The anchor of “The O’Reilly Factor” recounts the assassination of Abraham Lincoln.
books.name: KILLING LINCOLN

books.author: by Laura Hillenbrand
books.description: An Olympic runner’s story of survival as a prisoner of the Japanese in World War II.
books.name: UNBROKEN

books.author: by Tina Fey
books.description: A memoir from the former "Saturday Night Live" star and creator of "30 Rock."
books.name: BOSSYPANTS

books.author: by Katherine Boo
books.description: A journalist reports on families striving for better lives in a Mumbai slum.
books.name: BEHIND THE BEAUTIFUL FOREVERS

books.author: by Deborah Feldman
books.description: A woman breaks free of the Satmar Hasidic community in Brooklyn in which she was raised.
books.name: UNORTHODOX

books.author: by Scotty Bowers with Lionel Friedberg
books.description: A gossipy account of the sex lives of the stars during Hollywood’s golden age.
books.name: FULL SERVICE

books.author: by Susan Cain
books.description: Introverts — one-third of the population — are undervalued in American society.
books.name: QUIET

books.author: by Pamela Druckerman
books.description: An American mother discovers the principles of French parenting.
books.name: BRINGING UP BÉBÉ

books.author: by Rebecca Skloot
books.description: The story of a woman whose cancer cells were cultured without her permission in 1951.
books.name: THE IMMORTAL LIFE OF HENRIETTA LACKS

books.author: by Daniel Kahneman
books.description: The winner of the Nobel in economic science discusses how we make choices in business and personal life and when we can and cannot trust our intuitions.
books.name: THINKING, FAST AND SLOW
